actions.name: <Type> Desperation - Tutoring
actions.description: You are able to tutor the [Desperation] Ability of your chosen Type to yourself and any Pokemon you are responsible for of the chosen Type. This may be taken multiple times, each time selecting a different type for which you have a corresponding Type Specialty.
